title: Mobile Suit Gundam II: Soldiers of Sorrow
alternative_title: 機動戦士ガンダムⅡ　哀・戦士編
description: The Federation space ship White Base and its precious cargo of prototype mobile suits have returned to Earth, only to find themselves in enemy territory. As the White Base struggles across the planet's surface to safety, Gundam pilot Amuro Ray must contend not only with the Principality of Zeon's fiercest warriors, but also with his own doubts and fears.
